title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.7 - Refunds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.7 - Refunds

State Regulations

Upon entrance into the fleet registration program, the
registration fee for the second year will be refunded for vehicles in the first
year of a two-year registration and any credit remaining for registration fee
for the first year will be applied to the fleet registration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
30.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
